Statute.Title: Substantive Equality of Canada’s Official Languages, An Act for the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Égalité réelle entre les langues officielles du Canada, Loi visant l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2023, c. 15 in force on assent 20.06.2023, except,

Item.Text: — s. 12 in force on the first anniversary of the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 71(1) (20.06.2024)
— ss. 16(3.1) and (5) in force on the second anniversary of the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 71(1.1) (20.06.2025)
— ss. 36(2) to (4), s. 37, ss. 38(2), s. 39 and ss. 43(1) and (3) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(3) — Not in force
— s. 54, (enacting ss. 1 to 42 of the Use of French in Federally Regulated Private Businesses Act) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(4) — Not in force
— ss. 55 to 57.1, ss. 58(1), 59(1) to (3) and (5) and ss. 60 to 63 come into force on the second anniversary of the day fixed under ss. 71(4) see s. 71(5) — Not in force
— ss. 58(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(6) — Not in force
— ss. 59(4) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(7) — Not in force
— ss. 64 to 67 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(4) — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 17, s. 260 in force on assent 20.06.2024
